title: Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map
Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map Jigsaw Puzzle - 100 Piece Educational Fun for Ages 4+ - Build an Amazing Map of the United Kingdom & Ireland
description:
This outstanding, high quality, 100 piece UK jigsaw builds into a stunning map, illustrating the United Kingdom and Ireland by counties. The bizarrely shaped pieces turn the UK jigsaw puzzle into an ingenious challenge that is both great fun and highly educational too. Follow the picture to build the puzzle or use your own geographical knowledge to create this stunning full-colour map.The finished Happy Puzzle Jigraphy puzzle is approximately 50cm x 40cm.

 Age 4+

Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map Unveiling the Wonders of the United Kingdom and Ireland! Get ready for an exciting adventure with the Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map, a delightful 100-piece jigsaw puzzle that promises hours of engaging fun for the whole family. This isn't just any puzzle; it's a vibrant, full-colour map of the United Kingdom and Ireland, beautifully illustrating each county with engaging detail. Prepare to be captivated by the unusually shaped pieces that transform this puzzle into an ingenious challenge, making it a truly unique experience. This thoughtful design ensures that learning about the geography of the UK and Ireland becomes an exciting game, perfect for curious young minds and seasoned puzzlers alike. You can follow the handy picture guide to complete the map, or if you're feeling adventurous, put your geographical knowledge to the test and assemble it using your own expertise. The finished masterpiece, measuring an impressive 50cm by 40cm, will be a stunning visual representation of the British Isles that you'll be proud to display. Designed for children aged 4 and up, this high-quality puzzle fosters cognitive development, problem-solving skills, and a love for learning about the world around us. It’s crafted with outstanding durability to withstand countless hours of playful exploration. The bright colours and clear county divisions make it easy to identify different regions as you piece them together. This puzzle is more than just a pastime; it’s a journey of discovery that encourages conversation and shared experiences, making it an ideal activity for family game nights or quiet afternoons. The intricate details on the map provide opportunities for budding geographers to learn about cities, landmarks, and the distinct character of each county. It’s a wonderful way to introduce children to the shapes and locations of the countries that make up the United Kingdom and Ireland, fostering a sense of connection and curiosity. The unique interlocking of the bizarrely shaped pieces adds an extra layer of satisfaction when you find the perfect spot for each one, making the process of building the map incredibly rewarding. It’s a fantastic educational toy that seamlessly blends entertainment with learning, ensuring that every moment spent with this puzzle is both enjoyable and enriching. The large format of the finished puzzle makes it perfect for displaying on a table or wall, serving as a constant reminder of the geographical knowledge gained. This puzzle truly brings the fascinating landscape of the United Kingdom and Ireland to life in a fun and accessible way for everyone.

The BUKI France BN014 Nature Trek Outdoor Activity Playset offers an ideal way to ignite your children's enthusiasm for nature and outdoor exploration! Packed with everything they need for extended enjoyment, this playset includes binoculars, a magnifying glass, a compass, and a field guide. With these tools, they can delve into their backyard or embark on a nature hike, gaining knowledge about the diverse plants and animals they encounter. The binoculars and magnifying glass facilitate close encounters with wildlife, while the compass and field guide assist in navigating their surroundings. Unleash boundless possibilities with this comprehensive outdoor playset! Included:   binoculars, pedometer, head torch, compass, backpack. Age 6+

description: SmartMax Large is a chunky magnetic building set designed for little hands with big imaginations.  SmartMax Large contains 22 colourful magnetic bars and 8 metal balls. The attraction of magnets is simply irresistible for children to get there hand on! Plus, these oversized sturdy pieces offer a large range of exploring and connecting possibilities that stimulate the creativity of amplifying young minds. The oversized pieces are specifically created for handling by young children as they explore the interesting world of magnetism in a fun and safe way! This unique coded colour sequence means cold and warm coloured bars will connect together (as unlike poles attract) but other combinations will repel. Includes: 12 Medium bars 6 Long bars 4 Curved bars 8 Metal balls. Colourful guide with both product information and sample structures. Approx Size: 43cm x 35cm x 6cm 30 pieces. Age 1+.

The Sum Swamp™ maths board game is a fun and exciting way to build maths fluency as children practise addition and subtraction to get to the other side of the swamp. Suitable for 2-4 players, it’s a great way to keep kids engaged and learning in the classroom or at home. Use the dice to solve addition and subtraction sums and help your wildlife friends get to the other side of the swamp with this fun maths fluency educational game. Build mental maths agility and confidence in children aged 5+ by solving simple addition and subtraction sums. Suitable for 2-4 players, to play set out the game board and choose your game marker. Roll the dice and solve the addition or subtraction problem to move your marker forward. The first player to reach the other side of the swamp wins! Set includes 1 game board, 4 game markers, 2 number dice, 1 operation die and multilingual Directions for Game Play guide. Game board measures 72cm L x 24cm W. Age: 5-9

Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map Jigsaw Puzzle - 100 Piece Educational Fun for Ages 4+ - Build an Amazing Map of the United Kingdom & Ireland
description:
This outstanding, high quality, 100 piece UK jigsaw builds into a stunning map, illustrating the United Kingdom and Ireland by counties. The bizarrely shaped pieces turn the UK jigsaw puzzle into an ingenious challenge that is both great fun and highly educational too. Follow the picture to build the puzzle or use your own geographical knowledge to create this stunning full-colour map.The finished Happy Puzzle Jigraphy puzzle is approximately 50cm x 40cm.

 Age 4+

Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map Unveiling the Wonders of the United Kingdom and Ireland! Get ready for an exciting adventure with the Happy Puzzle Jigraphy UK Map, a delightful 100-piece jigsaw puzzle that promises hours of engaging fun for the whole family. This isn't just any puzzle; it's a vibrant, full-colour map of the United Kingdom and Ireland, beautifully illustrating each county with engaging detail. Prepare to be captivated by the unusually shaped pieces that transform this puzzle into an ingenious challenge, making it a truly unique experience. This thoughtful design ensures that learning about the geography of the UK and Ireland becomes an exciting game, perfect for curious young minds and seasoned puzzlers alike. You can follow the handy picture guide to complete the map, or if you're feeling adventurous, put your geographical knowledge to the test and assemble it using your own expertise. The finished masterpiece, measuring an impressive 50cm by 40cm, will be a stunning visual representation of the British Isles that you'll be proud to display. Designed for children aged 4 and up, this high-quality puzzle fosters cognitive development, problem-solving skills, and a love for learning about the world around us. It’s crafted with outstanding durability to withstand countless hours of playful exploration. The bright colours and clear county divisions make it easy to identify different regions as you piece them together. This puzzle is more than just a pastime; it’s a journey of discovery that encourages conversation and shared experiences, making it an ideal activity for family game nights or quiet afternoons. The intricate details on the map provide opportunities for budding geographers to learn about cities, landmarks, and the distinct character of each county. It’s a wonderful way to introduce children to the shapes and locations of the countries that make up the United Kingdom and Ireland, fostering a sense of connection and curiosity. The unique interlocking of the bizarrely shaped pieces adds an extra layer of satisfaction when you find the perfect spot for each one, making the process of building the map incredibly rewarding. It’s a fantastic educational toy that seamlessly blends entertainment with learning, ensuring that every moment spent with this puzzle is both enjoyable and enriching. The large format of the finished puzzle makes it perfect for displaying on a table or wall, serving as a constant reminder of the geographical knowledge gained. This puzzle truly brings the fascinating landscape of the United Kingdom and Ireland to life in a fun and accessible way for everyone.

The BUKI France BN014 Nature Trek Outdoor Activity Playset offers an ideal way to ignite your children's enthusiasm for nature and outdoor exploration! Packed with everything they need for extended enjoyment, this playset includes binoculars, a magnifying glass, a compass, and a field guide. With these tools, they can delve into their backyard or embark on a nature hike, gaining knowledge about the diverse plants and animals they encounter. The binoculars and magnifying glass facilitate close encounters with wildlife, while the compass and field guide assist in navigating their surroundings. Unleash boundless possibilities with this comprehensive outdoor playset! Included:   binoculars, pedometer, head torch, compass, backpack. Age 6+

description_changes.title: Water Based Colouring Kit - Hidden in the Sky

description: A water-based colouring set specially designed for little ones aged 18 months and over. Children use the water-filled pen to colour in the white areas and discover what is hiding underneath. Suddenly, patterns appear and the colours change - it's like magic! Once the pages are dry, the fun starts all over again! A colouring starter kit for children aged 18 months and up. It's like magic! A thick pencil suitable for small hands. A rigid tray to hold the 4 boards. Plastic boards to colour again and again. Handy storage set that is easily portable. Contents: 4 flexible plastic picture pages and a water pen. Age: 18M+

description: SmartMax Large is a chunky magnetic building set designed for little hands with big imaginations.  SmartMax Large contains 22 colourful magnetic bars and 8 metal balls. The attraction of magnets is simply irresistible for children to get there hand on! Plus, these oversized sturdy pieces offer a large range of exploring and connecting possibilities that stimulate the creativity of amplifying young minds. The oversized pieces are specifically created for handling by young children as they explore the interesting world of magnetism in a fun and safe way! This unique coded colour sequence means cold and warm coloured bars will connect together (as unlike poles attract) but other combinations will repel. Includes: 12 Medium bars 6 Long bars 4 Curved bars 8 Metal balls. Colourful guide with both product information and sample structures. Approx Size: 43cm x 35cm x 6cm 30 pieces. Age 1+.

description: Geography Jigsaw with a twist! The pieces are cleverly cut as well to make the puzzle that bit more challenging! Discover each country's capital city, see if you know the national currency and find out the population too. Follow the image included, or use your own knowledge to work out where each piece should be positioned! The finished puzzle features all 193 member states of the United Nations, ordered alphabetically by continent. Once you have finished building the puzzle, there is a multi-level quiz too! The finished puzzle is approximately 70cm x 70cm. 121 pieces. Age 6+

Head-To-Head Codebreaking Challenges... With An Ingenious Twist! Decypher is a battle of logical deduction as you race to crack your opponent’s code, before they crack your own! Displaying the numbers from 0 to 9 in a digital format uses just seven different vertical and horizontal lines. Discovering which lines appear where in each coded sequence will allow you to narrow down the code’s possibilities. Achieving this more efficiently than your opponent will win you the game! With multiple games and almost endless possible codes, Decypher’s challenges will keep you on the edge of your seat… and could define you as a master codebreaker! Box size approx. 28cm x 9cm Age 8+

The Bigjigs Rail Heritage Collection offers a delightful range of replicas from the golden age of rail. The packaging includes information about the evolution and working life of the engine, upon which the replica is based. Wooden replica of the Duchess of Hamilton locomotive. Licensed from the National Railway Museum, UK. Magnetic couplings ensure compatibility with all other engines and carriages in the Bigjigs Rail range. Consists of 2 play pieces. Most other major wooden railway brands are compatible with Bigjigs Rail. Made from high quality, responsibly sourced materials. Length: 19cm. 
 Age 3+ years.

The Sum Swamp™ maths board game is a fun and exciting way to build maths fluency as children practise addition and subtraction to get to the other side of the swamp. Suitable for 2-4 players, it’s a great way to keep kids engaged and learning in the classroom or at home. Use the dice to solve addition and subtraction sums and help your wildlife friends get to the other side of the swamp with this fun maths fluency educational game. Build mental maths agility and confidence in children aged 5+ by solving simple addition and subtraction sums. Suitable for 2-4 players, to play set out the game board and choose your game marker. Roll the dice and solve the addition or subtraction problem to move your marker forward. The first player to reach the other side of the swamp wins! Set includes 1 game board, 4 game markers, 2 number dice, 1 operation die and multilingual Directions for Game Play guide. Game board measures 72cm L x 24cm W. Age: 5-9

Licensed from the National Railway Museum, UK. Magnetic couplings ensure compatibility with all other engines and carriages in the Bigjigs Rail range. Consists of 2 play pieces. Most other major wooden railway brands are compatible with Bigjigs Rail. Made from high quality, responsibly sourced materials. Length: 19cm. 
 Age 3+ years.

The Sum Swamp™ maths board game is a fun and exciting way to build maths fluency as children practise addition and subtraction to get to the other side of the swamp. Suitable for 2-4 players, it’s a great way to keep kids engaged and learning in the classroom or at home. Use the dice to solve addition and subtraction sums and help your wildlife friends get to the other side of the swamp with this fun maths fluency educational game. Build mental maths agility and confidence in children aged 5+ by solving simple addition and subtraction sums. Suitable for 2-4 players, to play set out the game board and choose your game marker. Roll the dice and solve the addition or subtraction problem to move your marker forward. The first player to reach the other side of the swamp wins! Set includes 1 game board, 4 game markers, 2 number dice, 1 operation die and multilingual Directions for Game Play guide. Game board measures 72cm L x 24cm W. Age: 5-9

description: SmartMax Large is a chunky magnetic building set designed for little hands with big imaginations.  SmartMax Large contains 22 colourful magnetic bars and 8 metal balls. The attraction of magnets is simply irresistible for children to get there hand on! Plus, these oversized sturdy pieces offer a large range of exploring and connecting possibilities that stimulate the creativity of amplifying young minds. The oversized pieces are specifically created for handling by young children as they explore the interesting world of magnetism in a fun and safe way! This unique coded colour sequence means cold and warm coloured bars will connect together (as unlike poles attract) but other combinations will repel. Includes: 12 Medium bars 6 Long bars 4 Curved bars 8 Metal balls. Colourful guide with both product information and sample structures. Approx Size: 43cm x 35cm x 6cm 30 pieces. Age 1+.

description: Geography Jigsaw with a twist! The pieces are cleverly cut as well to make the puzzle that bit more challenging! Discover each country's capital city, see if you know the national currency and find out the population too. Follow the image included, or use your own knowledge to work out where each piece should be positioned! The finished puzzle features all 193 member states of the United Nations, ordered alphabetically by continent. Once you have finished building the puzzle, there is a multi-level quiz too! The finished puzzle is approximately 70cm x 70cm. 121 pieces. Age 6+

description:
Race to collect your vegetables but don’t wake Mr. McGregor!

  
 * Who will collect the most fresh fruit and veg in this vegetable patch board game? 
 * Don’t Wake Mr. McGregor! will have players growling AND snoring! 
 * This action-packed board game is perfect for Peter Rabbit™ fans 
 * Perfect as a birthday gift for children. 
 * Age 4+

Race to collect your vegetables but don’t wake Mr. McGregor! Who will collect the most fresh fruit and veg in this vegetable patch board game? Don’t Wake Mr. McGregor! will have players growling AND snoring! This action-packed board game is perfect for Peter Rabbit™ fans Perfect as a birthday gift for children. Age 4+

Head-To-Head Codebreaking Challenges... With An Ingenious Twist! Decypher is a battle of logical deduction as you race to crack your opponent’s code, before they crack your own! Displaying the numbers from 0 to 9 in a digital format uses just seven different vertical and horizontal lines. Discovering which lines appear where in each coded sequence will allow you to narrow down the code’s possibilities. Achieving this more efficiently than your opponent will win you the game! With multiple games and almost endless possible codes, Decypher’s challenges will keep you on the edge of your seat… and could define you as a master codebreaker! Box size approx. 28cm x 9cm Age 8+

Perfect outdoor game to play in the garden, at the park or on the beach. An entertainment essential for any outdoor social gathering. Develops hand/eye co-ordination. Contents: 6 Horse shoes (14cm x 4cm 3 Wooden mint coloured numbered target pins (stakes 22cm) Age 3+

The Sum Swamp™ maths board game is a fun and exciting way to build maths fluency as children practise addition and subtraction to get to the other side of the swamp. Suitable for 2-4 players, it’s a great way to keep kids engaged and learning in the classroom or at home. Use the dice to solve addition and subtraction sums and help your wildlife friends get to the other side of the swamp with this fun maths fluency educational game. Build mental maths agility and confidence in children aged 5+ by solving simple addition and subtraction sums. Suitable for 2-4 players, to play set out the game board and choose your game marker. Roll the dice and solve the addition or subtraction problem to move your marker forward. The first player to reach the other side of the swamp wins! Set includes 1 game board, 4 game markers, 2 number dice, 1 operation die and multilingual Directions for Game Play guide. Game board measures 72cm L x 24cm W. Age: 5-9

description: SmartMax Large is a chunky magnetic building set designed for little hands with big imaginations.  SmartMax Large contains 22 colourful magnetic bars and 8 metal balls. The attraction of magnets is simply irresistible for children to get there hand on! Plus, these oversized sturdy pieces offer a large range of exploring and connecting possibilities that stimulate the creativity of amplifying young minds. The oversized pieces are specifically created for handling by young children as they explore the interesting world of magnetism in a fun and safe way! This unique coded colour sequence means cold and warm coloured bars will connect together (as unlike poles attract) but other combinations will repel. Includes: 12 Medium bars 6 Long bars 4 Curved bars 8 Metal balls. Colourful guide with both product information and sample structures. Approx Size: 43cm x 35cm x 6cm 30 pieces. Age 1+.
